column5: We'll be in Wawa on Sunday and I'm wondering if there will be any restaurants open that evening. WE usually eat at the Columbia-does anyone know if it's open or know another good one that's open Sun. evenings? Thanks

Not to sure about the hours but the place we eat every year is called Route 17 (i believe). Really good pizza and service. I would think they would be open on Sunday but, not too late. It's in town about half way and on the left.
we allways eat at the Embassy Resturant right downtown. don't know their hours, but the double chocolate dessert cake is worth the stop..... tell mary(who makes the DCD fresh every day)hello for me!
We always eat at Wally's. Can't go wrong there on either service or price.
We travel up from Michigan several times a year and like to hit either the Cedarhof just south of town or the Viking in town.
They serve food in Wawa? I thought is was a place to drink beer before you left in the morning.

Hey guys, there is a great little trout lake that will cook the fish you catch. You don't have to stay there, but you can. We were there about 10 years agao, not sure if they are still in buz. Good Luck, Bill
